page.title: 06A Day in Sarah Cobbe's Life
page.content:
My favourite programme is{Western {Films.}Then at half past eight I put my {pyjamas}on and go to bed in my own room.
(Sarah Cobbe, Age 9) ______________________________________ { Extracts from Children's Days
At halfpast 7 my dad opens my{bedroom door. Then I get up and I walk half asleep down the stairs and collect all my clothes together. I go in the {bathroom}and have a{wash}and look through my clothes to make sure that I have everything.(A.B.) Then my mum calls me so I go down stairs and I have{Kellogs Corn Flakes and{coffee}and{toast with jam.}Then I go to school on my own.(P.O.)
